EmailTemplate.description: Pending cancellation but were unable to connect with the client
EmailTemplate.name: Retention- Client Missed Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Account Review - {!Account.Client_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
We wanted to touch base with you regarding your Yodle account. Sorry we werenâ€™t able to connect when we called. Please let us know what time works best for you and we will be sure to reach out.
We look forward to connecting. As always, you can reach us directly at (877) 334-4321. Thanks again for your business and have a great day!
Thank you!
